subtitle: One Step at a Time.
tagline: Your Path to a Sustainable Future: Easy Access to Eco-Friendly Choices for Everyone.

valuesSection.title: Our Values
valuesSection.subTitle: The Farming Co.
valuesSection.description1: At The Farming Co., we envision a world where everyone can access sustainable and eco-friendly products. We believe that even small changes can make a significant impact, and we're dedicated to making those changes attainable for all.
valuesSection.description2: We value sustainability, ethics, &community. We believe in treating our customers, employees, and suppliers with respect and fairness. We are committed to reducing our carbon footprint and promoting sustainable practices in all aspects of our business.

contactSection.address: H. No. 10/1853, Madhalawada Lamgao, Bicholim, North-Goa, Goa-403504
